findings.title: I01. Floating pragma usage
findings.description: The project uses floating pragmas ^0.8.20 which may result in contracts being deployed using the wrong pragma version, different from the one they were tested with.

findings.title: I02. Incorrect call of inherited contract
findings.description: The GodToken contract incorrectly calls the inherited CustomErrorToken contract.

findings.title: Inadequate Interface Implementation
findings.description: A Marketplace contract must contain at least an interface of this token contract to call the limited Marketplace-only functions.
